nodes.bodyText: add changes to the output of -h/--help
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,7 +39,8 @@ The rest of this topic focus on serving of model files without much discussion o
 
 ```bash
 $ torchserve --help
-usage: torechserve [-h] [--start]
+usage: torechserve [-h] [-v | --version]

nodes.bodyText: made changes in single line comment, which will also output in -h and --help
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,7 +39,8 @@ The rest of this topic focus on serving of model files without much discussion o
 
 ```bash
 $ torchserve --help
-usage: torechserve [-h] [--start]

nodes.bodyText: is this tested with fresh installation? Looks like syntax issue as there is a , missing after --version
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -22,8 +22,7 @@ def ts_parser():
         parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(prog='torchserve', description='Torchserve')
 
         sub_parse = parser.add_mutually_exclusive_group(required=False)
-        sub_parse.add_argument('-v', action='store_true', help='Return TorchServe Version')
-        sub_parse.add_argument('--version', action='store_true', help='Return TorchServe Version')
+        sub_parse.add_argument('-v','--version' action='store_true', help='Return TorchServe Version')
